channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Lawsuit challenges Trump administration crackdown on international students
item.description: A class action lawsuit filed Friday asks a federal court to reinstate the legal status of international students caught up in a Trump administration crackdown that has left more than a thousand fearful of deportation.

item.title: US senator returns from El Salvador trip, says Abrego Garcia case is about far more than one man
10,000 pages of records about Robert F. Kennedy’s 1968 assassination are released, on Trump’s order
